@pompei79 @ginlindzey Yeah, plaques. I assume there could be metal hanging bits on porticoes or facades, but with all the reconstruction, youâ€™d have to go back to excavation photos (at least, at Ostia)... There are lead hangers between piers for ropes (?) on several portico sections.
@pompei79 @ginlindzey Yeah, @pompei79 is right! All come from funerary reliefs. Most are Isola Sacra & a few Porta Laurentina necropolis. There are â€˜signsâ€™ but just tools, horse & mill, etc.
